00033 void CrossCorrelate::AutoCorrelate(DataCollection<double>::selection *data, bool average)
00034 {
00035 #ifdef NOFFTW
00036     throw std::runtime_error("CrossCorrelate::AutoCorrelate is not compiled-in due to disabling of FFTW - recompile libtools with '--with-ffw'");
00037 #else
00038     size_t N = (*data)[0].size();
00039     _corrfunc.resize(N);
00040 
00041     fftw_complex *tmp;
00042     fftw_plan fft, ifft;
00043     
00044     tmp = (fftw_complex*) fftw_malloc(sizeof(fftw_complex) * (N/2+1));
00045 
00046     fft = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_1d(N, &(*data)[0][0], tmp,
00047                                     FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00048     ifft = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_1d(N, tmp, &_corrfunc[0],
00049                                     FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00050     fftw_execute(fft);
00051     
00052     tmp[0][0] = tmp[0][1] = 0;
00053     for(size_t i=1; i<N/2+1; i++) {
00054         tmp[i][0] = tmp[i][0]*tmp[i][0] + tmp[i][1]*tmp[i][1];
00055         tmp[i][1] = 0;       
00056     }
00057     fftw_execute(ifft);
00058     
00059     /*double m=0;
00060     for(int i=0; i<N; i++) {
00061         _corrfunc[i] = 0;
00062         m+=(*data)[0][i];
00063     }
00064     m=m/(double)N;
00065     for(int i=0;i<N; i++)
00066         for(int j=0; j<N-i-1; j++)
00067             _corrfunc[i]+=((*data)[0][j]-m)*((*data)[0][(i+j)]-m);
00068     */
00069     double d = _corrfunc[0];
00070     for(size_t i=0; i<N; i++)
00071         _corrfunc[i] = _corrfunc[i]/d;
00072     //cout << *data << endl;
00073     fftw_destroy_plan(fft);
00074     fftw_destroy_plan(ifft);
00075     fftw_free(tmp);
00076 #endif
00077 }
00078 
00079 void CrossCorrelate::AutoFourier(vector <double>& ivec){
00080 #ifdef NOFFTW
00081     throw std::runtime_error("CrossCorrelate::AutoFourier is not compiled-in due to disabling of FFTW - recompile libtools with '--with-ffw'");
00082 #else
00083     size_t N = ivec.size();
00084     _corrfunc.resize(N);
00085 
00086     fftw_complex *tmp;
00087     fftw_plan fft;
00088     
00089     tmp = (fftw_complex*) fftw_malloc(sizeof(fftw_complex) * (N/2+1));
00090 
00091     fft = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_1d(N, &ivec[0], tmp, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00092     fftw_execute(fft);
00093     
00094     tmp[0][0] = tmp[0][1] = 0;
00095     for(size_t i=1; i<N/2+1; i++) {
00096         tmp[i][0] = tmp[i][0]*tmp[i][0] + tmp[i][1]*tmp[i][1];
00097         tmp[i][1] = 0;       
00098     }
00099     
00100     // copy the real component of temp to the _corrfunc vector
00101     for(size_t i=0; i<N; i++){
00102         _corrfunc[i] = tmp[i][0];
00103     }
00104     
00105     fftw_destroy_plan(fft);
00106     fftw_free(tmp);
00107 #endif
00108 }
00109 
00110 void CrossCorrelate::FFTOnly(vector <double>& ivec){
00111 #ifdef NOFFTW
00112     throw std::runtime_error("CrossCorrelate::FFTOnly is not compiled-in due to disabling of FFTW - recompile libtools with '--with-ffw'");
00113 #else
00114     size_t N = ivec.size();
00115     _corrfunc.resize(N);
00116 
00117     fftw_complex *tmp;
00118     fftw_plan fft;
00119     
00120     tmp = (fftw_complex*) fftw_malloc(sizeof(fftw_complex) * (N/2+1));
00121 
00122     fft = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_1d(N, &ivec[0], tmp, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00123     fftw_execute(fft);
00124     
00125     // copy the real component of temp to the _corrfunc vector
00126     for(size_t i=0; i<N/2+1; i++){
00127         _corrfunc[i] = tmp[i][0];
00128     }
00129     
00130     fftw_destroy_plan(fft);
00131     fftw_free(tmp);
00132 #endif
00133 }
00134 
00135 void CrossCorrelate::DCTOnly(vector <double>& ivec){
00136 #ifdef NOFFTW
00137     throw std::runtime_error("CrossCorrelate::DCTOnly is not compiled-in due to disabling of FFTW - recompile libtools with '--with-ffw'");
00138 #else
00139     size_t N = ivec.size();
00140     _corrfunc.resize(N);
00141     
00142     vector <double> tmp;
00143     tmp.resize(N);
00144     fftw_plan fft;
00145     
00146     // do real to real discrete cosine trafo
00147     fft = fftw_plan_r2r_1d(N, &ivec[0], &tmp[0], FFTW_REDFT10, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00148     fftw_execute(fft);
00149     
00150     // store results
00151     for(size_t i=0; i<N; i++){
00152         _corrfunc[i] = tmp[i];
00153     }
00154     
00155     fftw_destroy_plan(fft);
00156 #endif
00157 }
00158 
00159 void CrossCorrelate::AutoCosine(vector <double>& ivec){
00160 #ifdef NOFFTW
00161     throw std::runtime_error("CrossCorrelate::AutoCosing is not compiled-in due to disabling of FFTW - recompile libtools with '--with-ffw'");
00162 #else
00163     size_t N = ivec.size();
00164     _corrfunc.resize(N);
00165     
00166     vector <double> tmp;
00167     tmp.resize(N);
00168     fftw_plan fft;
00169     
00170     // do real to real discrete cosine trafo
00171     fft = fftw_plan_r2r_1d(N, &ivec[0], &tmp[0], FFTW_REDFT10, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00172     fftw_execute(fft);
00173     
00174     // compute autocorrelation
00175     tmp[0] = 0;
00176     for(size_t i=1; i<N; i++) {
00177         tmp[i] = tmp[i]*tmp[i];       
00178     }
00179     
00180     // store results
00181     for(size_t i=0; i<N; i++){
00182         _corrfunc[i] = tmp[i];
00183     }
00184     
00185     fftw_destroy_plan(fft);
00186 #endif
00187 }
00188 
00189 void CrossCorrelate::AutoCorr(vector <double>& ivec){
00190 #ifdef NOFFTW
00191     throw std::runtime_error("CrossCorrelate::AutoCorr is not compiled-in due to disabling of FFTW - recompile libtool with '--with-ffw'");
00192 #else
00193     size_t N = ivec.size();
00194     _corrfunc.resize(N);
00195 
00196     fftw_complex *tmp;
00197     fftw_plan fft, ifft;
00198     
00199     tmp = (fftw_complex*) fftw_malloc(sizeof(fftw_complex) * (N/2+1));
00200 
00201     fft = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_1d(N, &ivec[0], tmp, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00202     ifft = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_1d(N, tmp, &_corrfunc[0], FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00203     fftw_execute(fft);
00204     
00205     tmp[0][0] = tmp[0][1] = 0;
00206     for(size_t i=1; i<N/2+1; i++) {
00207         tmp[i][0] = tmp[i][0]*tmp[i][0] + tmp[i][1]*tmp[i][1];
00208         tmp[i][1] = 0;       
00209     }
00210     
00211     fftw_execute(ifft);
00212     
00213     double d = _corrfunc[0];
00214     for(size_t i=0; i<N; i++)
00215         _corrfunc[i] = _corrfunc[i]/d;
00216     
00217     fftw_destroy_plan(fft);
00218     fftw_destroy_plan(ifft);
00219     fftw_free(tmp);
00220 #endif
00221 }
